Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell anode microstructure is obtained using X-ray technology.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A complete three-dimensional (3D) and fine heterogeneous model is built on the basis of the microstructure.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The difference between the simulation results of microscopic and macroscopic models is compared.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The physical fields of the heterogeneous model are analyzed and the effects of operating conditions are investigated.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results show that the electrochemical reaction at three-phase boundaries does not cause a high concentration gradient in the pore phase.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The H-2 molar fraction and concentration overpotential almost linearly decrease with the anode depth.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the decrease of the H-2 molar fraction is small, indicating that fuel supply is sufficient.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Compared with activation and ohmic overpotentials, the concentration overpotential is negligible.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Given the heterogeneity of the microstructure, the physical fields of the anode would fluctuate.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The higher the electrochemical reaction rate, the greater the fluctuation of the physical fields.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As shown in the microscopic simulation result, the active thickness of the anode is expressed as the analytical function of the operating conditions and microstructure parameters.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The active thickness increases with temperature and H-2 molar fraction but slightly decreases with the total overpotential.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The active thickness is analytically expressed as the function of electrode parameters and operating conditions, which can improve electrode design and optimization.
Titulo: Three-Dimensional Microscopic Modeling and Activation Thickness Analysis of the Anode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
